full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,CHOS SKYONG LCAM SRING GI BZLOG BSGYUR ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @008B (ZHES PA 'DI NI CHOS LAM SRING GI RTZA RGYUD KYI GZHUNG LAS LEN PA DE NI SHING TU BSDUS PA'I PHYIR, ,DE LAS CHUNG RGYAS NAS BGYI BA ZHES, ,AER TE NI TZAS SANG BSTAN PA DAR RGYAS ZHES BYA BA 'DI LTA BU DGOS ZHES NAN TAN GYIS YANG YANG BSKUL BA'I NGO MCHOG PAR, ,SKYABS GNAS DAM PA DZA YA PAndI TA BLO BZANG SNYAN GRAGS DGE LEGS RNAM RGYAL DPAL BZANG PO SLOB MA RNAMS KYI THA SHAL BA, ,BYUNG RGYAL DU SONG BA'I BLO BZANG DPAL MGON MING CAN GYIS BRIS PA LA LHAG CHANG LA SOGS PA'I NYIS SKYON THAMS CAD BLA MA LHA DANG CHOS SKYONG LCAM SRING 'KHOR BCAS KYIS THUGS BRTZE BA'I BZOD PAR MDZAD DU GSOL, ,GAL TE LEGS CHA CUNG ZAD YONG NA DE DAG SOGS 'GRO KUN DENG NAS BYANG CHUB MTHOB KYI BAR DU LAM BZANG GI RKYEN NGAN BAR CHAD KUN BZLOG PA'I GROGS MDZAD PAR GYUR CIG ,'GRO BA THAMS CAD LA DGE BAR GYUR CIG ,)
